Experience

Senior Full-stack Software Engineer

Mindful Education Limited, London.
  • Developing Moodle Plugins for a ‘blended-learning’ education-tech platform using PHP, MySQL and AngularJS.
  • Building an admin dashboard and reporting platform using Node.js, React, GraphQL and Amazon Web Services.
  • Deploying and maintaining the applications above on Amazon Web Services using CloudFormation, Amplify, AppSync, Amazon ECS and EC2 servers, AWS Lambda for serverless functions, DynamoDB and RDS databases, Redis Caching and Amazon S3 + EFS for file storage.
  • Introduced the Agile concepts of sprint planning, story estimation and sprint reviews within the team which helped the Head of Digital in planning and communicating the team's work to senior management.
Jul 2019 - Present

Associate Lecturer (Part-time)

EM Normandie Business School, Oxford.
  • Delivering introductory courses in Programming (Python, Java, PHP, HTML, CSS) and Software Engineering to Undergraduate and Postgraduate students studying degrees in Business, Management, Banking and Finance.
  • One of the few lecturers in the entire campus to consistently have a student feedback score higher than 9/10.
  • Making complex subjects such as Object Oriented Programming more accessible to complete beginners and non-developers.
Mar 2017 - Present

Lead Software Engineer

GENEO Software Limited, Royal Leamington Spa.
  • Led the development of a "Lean Engineering" enterprise web application by setting the standard for clean and reusable object-oriented PHP code.
  • Re-wrote the core systems (User Management, File Management, Authorisation and Permissions) using the CakePHP framework and deployed it on a LAMP (Amazon Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP) stack on AWS.
  • Delivered the above project by deleting 120,000 lines of code while adding only 60,000 lines of code using cleaner 'Don't-Repeat-Yourself (DRY)' methods.
  • Saved the company £9,000/year by reorganising EC2, EBS, RDS, SES and other resources on Amazon Web Services used to host the application.
  • Created a robust Continuous Delivery and Integration platform using Jenkins CI.
  • Enforced Test-Driven Development (TDD) with PHPUnit while introducing rapid automated Front-end Testing using Selenium.
  • Led a major 12 month transformation from Waterfall to Agile methodologies that would radically change the entire software development lifecycle leading to a successful delivery of £100k projects.
  • As the Scrum Master, introduced 2 week sprints instead of long 6-18 month projects.
  • Achieved software delivery goals for the first time in the company’s 11 year history and decreased sprint volatility to <8%.
  • Led successful recruitment campaigns, especially at the University of Birmingham, to add 7 young and dynamic developers to the Agile development team.
Mar 2013 - Nov 2018

CakePHP Web Programmer / System Administrator

Staywimi Ltd., Greater London.
  • Server Setup and Administration: Re-creating and organising the web application’s Production, Testing and Development servers (Web and Database servers) using Amazon Web Services (EC2, EBS, RDS). Along with DNS redirects and the power of Git, a Zero-downtime deployment architecture was successfully achieved.
  • Restructuring the Information Architecture: Created a shorter flow from Landing pages to Payments increasing number of bookings by 100% post-Olympics
  • Automated all tasks to save an admin’s time by upto 3 hrs/day. Rebranding the website to improve User experience (UX) thereby increasing the conversion rate by 40%
  • Optimizing site speed – Time to search for properties in London was reduced to 0.8 sec from an embarrassing 24 seconds.
Mar 2012 - Nov 2012

Web Developer

Euro International Communications, Essex.
